english.segment1: Mary Had A Baby Born In A Manger. Mary What To Do, Mary What To Do?. Before The Vow Was Made, In Her Belly Laid The King
english.segment3: Sing Mary, Sing. Lullabye The King. Born To Be Our Pardon. No Longer Shall We Weep. Come Soften What Was Hardened Girl. Sing Mary, Sing. Herod With A Vision Out With A Vengeance. Mary What To Do, Mary What To Do?. Flee To Galilee. Raise Your Baby King Of Kings
english.segment5: Mary In Your Mornings. Turn Now As You Weep. Look To See A Savior. O, Sing Mary, Sing!. Sing Mary, Sing!
